component.name: Reaction Picker
component.description: An interactive reaction picker component allowing users to select emoji or reaction icons for feedback and engagement purposes. Features emoji library, search functionality, recent reactions tracking, and customizable reaction categories.

variants.name: Material Design
variants.description: An engaging reaction picker implementation with easy emoji access, clear organization, responsive selection feedback, and smooth animations. Enables intuitive user reactions with smooth interactions, visual selection indicators, and comprehensive emoji library access.

variants.name: Glassmorphism
variants.description: Reaction Picker implementation in Glassmorphism style

variants.name: Neumorphism
variants.description: Reaction Picker implementation in Neumorphism style

variants.name: Minimalism
variants.description: Reaction Picker implementation in Minimalism style
